Our Price start from 25000 taka where We provide Domain, hosting and eCommerce solution with a admin panel from where you can manage your products and order.  Customer can easily see your product and details . They can order with 2 click and can pay you by VISA, MasterCard,  bKash, Rocket, Nagad. For more details, call us: 01973009007. We are the best eCommerce Website Development Company in Bangladesh​ since 2008. We are also BASIS and e-Cab member.

Order Now
Call: +8801973009007

eCommerce Website Development
Process of ZAMAN IT

At ZAMAN IT, we understand that a successful eCommerce website is more than just an online store. It’s a platform that drives sales, enhances customer experience, and builds brand loyalty. Our development process is designed to deliver exceptional eCommerce solutions tailored to your specific business needs.

Phase 1: Discovery and Planning.

  • Initial Consultation: We begin by understanding your business goals, target audience, products or services, and desired website functionality.
  • Market Research: Our team conducts thorough market research to identify industry trends, competitor analysis, and target customer behavior.
  • Project Scope Definition: We define the project scope, including features, functionalities, and platforms to be used.
  • Ecommerce Platform Selection: We recommend the most suitable eCommerce platform based on your business requirements, budget, and scalability.
  • Design Concept Development: We create initial design concepts for your eCommerce website, reflecting your brand identity and target audience preferences.

Phase 2: Design and Development

  • UI/UX Design: Our design team develops user-friendly and visually appealing website designs, ensuring optimal user experience.
  • Ecommerce Functionality Development: We build the core eCommerce features, including product catalog, shopping cart, checkout process, and payment gateways.
  • Custom Development: We develop custom features and integrations to meet your specific business requirements.
  • Responsive Design: We ensure your website is fully responsive and optimized for various devices (desktop, tablet, mobile).
  • Content Management System (CMS) Integration: We integrate a user-friendly CMS for easy content management and updates.

Phase 3: Development and Testing

  • Website Development: Our development team builds the website based on the approved design and specifications.
  • Quality Assurance Testing: We conduct rigorous testing to identify and fix any bugs or issues.
  • Performance Optimization: We optimize website speed and performance for a seamless user experience.
  • Security Testing: We implement robust security measures to protect your website and customer data.

Phase 4: Launch and Deployment

  • Website Launch: We deploy the completed website to your chosen hosting environment.
  • Data Migration: We migrate product data, customer information, and other relevant data to the new website.
  • Training: We provide comprehensive training to your team on website management and administration.
  • Go-Live Support: We offer post-launch support to address any initial issues or questions.

 

Phase 5: Ongoing Support and Optimization

  • Performance Monitoring: We continuously monitor website performance and identify areas for improvement.
  • Security Updates: We keep your website updated with the latest security patches.
  • SEO Optimization: We implement SEO best practices to improve search engine visibility.
  • Analytics and Reporting: We provide regular performance reports and analytics to track website performance.

 

At ZAMAN IT, we are committed to delivering exceptional eCommerce solutions that drive growth and success for your business. Our development process is designed to be collaborative, transparent, and focused on your specific needs. We look forward to partnering with you to create a world-class online store.

Need Help?

Why Choose ZAMAN IT for Your
eCommerce Website Design?

ZAMAN IT is your trusted partner in transforming your business into a thriving online presence. Here’s why you should choose us for your eCommerce website design:

Best Service in Bangladesh

Our reputation speaks for itself. ZAMAN IT is recognized as the leading e-commerce service provider in Bangladesh. We pride ourselves on delivering top-notch services that exceed client expectations, with a focus on innovation, usability, and customer satisfaction.

WooCommerce Expertise

Whether you’re looking to build a new WooCommerce store or enhance your existing one, we’ve got you covered. Our team specializes in WooCommerce, offering seamless integration, custom development, and optimization to ensure your store performs at its best.

16+ Years of Experience

With over 16 years of experience in the industry, we have a deep understanding of what it takes to create a successful e-commerce platform. Our extensive experience ensures that we bring best practices, expert insights, and the latest technology to your project.

1 Month of Free Support

We believe in long-term partnerships, which is why we offer 1 month of free support after the completion of your e-commerce project. This ensures that your online store runs smoothly and any issues are resolved promptly.

7 Days Delivery

Time is money, and we respect both. With ZAMAN IT, you can expect your fully functional e-commerce website to be delivered in just 7 days. Our efficient processes and experienced team ensure that we meet our deadlines without compromising on quality.

We Write SEO-Friendly Content

ZAMAN IT, we understand the importance of visibility in the digital marketplace. That’s why we write SEO-friendly content that helps your e-commerce site rank higher on search engines, attract more visitors, and convert them into customers.

Customer Focus.

  • Clear Communication: We maintain open and transparent communication throughout the project.
  • Dedicated Support: Our dedicated team is always available to assist you with any questions or concerns.
  • On-Time Delivery: We prioritize deadlines and deliver projects on time without compromising quality.
  • Competitive Pricing: We offer competitive pricing packages without compromising on quality or service.

As the digital landscape continues to evolve, the importance of eCommerce website design has become increasingly evident, especially in developing countries like Bangladesh. With a burgeoning middle class and rising internet penetration, the demand for online shopping platforms has skyrocketed. This shift necessitates a focus on eCommerce website design that not only attracts customers but also enhances their shopping experience. Among the various players in this sector, ZAMAN IT has emerged as a leading eCommerce website design company in Bangladesh, offering innovative solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of local businesses.

The Growth of eCommerce in Bangladesh

A Rapidly Evolving Market

In recent years, Bangladesh has witnessed a significant surge in eCommerce website design activities. The country’s internet penetration rate has exceeded 100 million users, with social media platforms like Facebook playing a pivotal role in facilitating online shopping. According to reports, the eCommerce website design market in Bangladesh is expected to reach a value of $3 billion by 2023, driven by increased smartphone usage and improved digital payment solutions.

Key Factors Driving Growth

  1. Urbanization: Rapid urbanization has led to a more tech-savvy population that seeks convenience in shopping.
  2. Digital Payment Solutions: The rise of mobile payment platforms like bKash and Rocket has made online transactions seamless and secure.
  3. COVID-19 Impact: The pandemic has accelerated the shift to online shopping as consumers have turned to eCommerce website design for safety and convenience.

The Importance of eCommerce Website Design

User Experience (UX)

Effective eCommerce website design goes beyond aesthetics; it’s about creating an optimal user experience. A well-designed website can significantly enhance customer satisfaction, leading to increased conversion rates. Key elements of UX include:

  • Navigation: Simple and intuitive navigation helps users find products effortlessly.
  • Loading Speed: Faster loading times reduce bounce rates and keep users engaged.
  • Mobile Responsiveness: With a significant portion of users accessing sites via mobile devices, a responsive design is crucial.

Branding

Your eCommerce website design serves as the online face of your brand. A consistent and visually appealing design reinforces brand identity and builds trust with customers. Key branding elements include:

  • Color Scheme: The choice of colors can evoke emotions and influence purchasing decisions.
  • Typography: Readable and aesthetically pleasing fonts enhance the overall look of the website.
  • Imagery: High-quality images of products are essential for attracting and retaining customers.

Search Engine Optimization (SEO)

A well-optimized eCommerce website design can significantly improve visibility in search engine results. This involves:

  • Keyword Research: Identifying relevant keywords helps in optimizing product descriptions and metadata.
  • Content Creation: Blogs and guides related to products can enhance SEO and provide value to customers.
  • Link Building: Quality backlinks can improve a website’s authority and ranking.

Key Elements of Effective eCommerce Website Design

1. User-Friendly Interface

A user-friendly interface is critical for reducing friction in the buying process. Features like search bars, filters, and clear calls-to-action (CTAs) make it easier for customers to navigate the site.

2. Secure Payment Gateways

Security is paramount in eCommerce website design. Integrating reliable payment gateways ensures that customer transactions are safe. This builds trust and encourages repeat business.

3. Product Pages

Detailed product pages are essential for informing customers. Each product should have:

  • High-resolution images
  • Descriptive titles
  • Clear pricing information
  • Customer reviews and ratings

4. Shopping Cart and Checkout Process

The shopping cart should be easily accessible, and the checkout process should be streamlined. Reducing the number of steps in the checkout process can decrease cart abandonment rates.

5. Customer Support

Providing accessible customer support options, such as live chat or a comprehensive FAQ section, can significantly enhance user satisfaction.

6. Responsive Design

With an increasing number of consumers shopping via mobile devices, having a responsive design ensures that your website looks great and functions well on all screen sizes.

7. Analytics and Tracking

Integrating analytics tools allows businesses to monitor user behavior, track sales, and make data-driven decisions to improve the site.

ZAMAN IT: Leading the Charge in eCommerce Website Design

Company Overview

Founded with the vision of transforming the digital landscape of Bangladesh, ZAMAN IT has established itself as a frontrunner in eCommerce website design. The company specializes in providing tailored solutions that cater to the unique needs of local businesses.

Services Offered

  1. Custom Website Design: ZAMAN IT focuses on creating bespoke designs that align with the client’s brand identity and target audience.
  2. Mobile App Development: Understanding the significance of mobile commerce, ZAMAN IT also offers mobile app development services.
  3. SEO and Digital Marketing: The company provides comprehensive digital marketing services to ensure that clients achieve visibility and growth.
  4. Support and Maintenance: ZAMAN IT offers ongoing support to ensure that clients’ websites remain functional and up-to-date.

Unique Selling Propositions

  1. Local Expertise: With a deep understanding of the Bangladeshi market, ZAMAN IT tailors its strategies to meet local demands.
  2. Innovative Solutions: The company is committed to staying ahead of trends and technologies, ensuring that clients benefit from the latest advancements.
  3. Customer-Centric Approach: ZAMAN IT prioritizes customer satisfaction, offering personalized services and support.

Case Studies and Success Stories

ZAMAN IT has successfully collaborated with various businesses across different sectors, showcasing their ability to deliver results. Some notable projects include:

  • E-Commerce Fashion Brand: ZAMAN IT redesigned an existing online store, improving loading speed by 50% and increasing conversion rates by 30%.
  • Grocery Delivery Service: The company developed a mobile app and website that integrated seamless payment solutions, resulting in a 40% increase in customer retention.

Challenges in eCommerce Website Design in Bangladesh

Despite the growth potential, several challenges hinder the development of eCommerce website design in Bangladesh:

  1. Internet Connectivity: Although improving, internet connectivity issues in rural areas can affect eCommerce growth.
  2. Payment Security: Building trust in online transactions remains a challenge for many consumers.
  3. Competition: As more players enter the market, standing out becomes increasingly difficult.

Future Trends in eCommerce Website Design

1. Artificial Intelligence (AI)

AI-driven tools are set to revolutionize eCommerce website design by providing personalized shopping experiences, predictive analytics, and customer service chatbots.

2. Augmented Reality (AR)

AR technologies can enhance online shopping by allowing customers to visualize products in their own environment before making a purchase.

3. Voice Commerce

With the rise of smart speakers, optimizing eCommerce website design for voice search is becoming increasingly important.

4. Sustainable Practices

As consumers become more environmentally conscious, eCommerce businesses that adopt sustainable practices and showcase them on their websites may gain a competitive advantage.

Conclusion

The eCommerce landscape in Bangladesh is ripe with opportunities, and the role of effective website design cannot be overstated. With user experience, branding, and SEO being crucial elements, businesses must invest in a well-designed platform to thrive in this competitive market. ZAMAN IT stands out as a leader in this space, offering innovative and tailored solutions that address the unique needs of Bangladeshi businesses. As the market continues to evolve, partnering with a trusted eCommerce website design company like ZAMAN IT can be the key to unlocking growth and success in the digital age.

In the fast-paced world of eCommerce, the right design and strategy can make all the difference. Embracing modern technologies and prioritizing customer experience will enable businesses in Bangladesh to seize the myriad opportunities that lie ahead.
